entries.title: Antivirus software can be hijacked to wipe data
entries.description: Cybersecurity researcher claims to have unearthed a way to "trick" popular antivirus tools into deleting user data.

entries.title: There's some really good news if you want to buy a Raspberry Pi
entries.description: Raspberry Pi says it hopes to return to pre-pandemic levels in 2023.

entries.title: A third of all internet users have been victims of a data breach
entries.description: Thales claims huge number of internet users have been data breach victims.

entries.title: Whatsapp messages could soon disappear as soon as they're read
entries.description: Currently only available on Android, the upcoming feature will delete text messages after the recipient opens them.

entries.title: New attack method can steal offline PC data through walls
entries.description: New concept can reportedly gather data by decoding power supply radiation.

entries.title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 news could be imminent – here's why
entries.description: Cryptic tweets and a dedicated PlayStation Store page suggest Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 news could be on the horizon.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams is launching a chat feature in Outlook
entries.description: Outlook users will soon enjoy a Microsoft Teams chat experience.

entries.title: C++ just overtook Java as the world's most popular programming language
entries.description: Java falls out of top three, below Python and C, as C++ storms in with a major increase in rankings.

entries.title: Activision Blizzard acquisition is 'in the best interest of gamers', says Xbox boss
entries.description: Xbox boss Phil Spencer has spoken about how Microsoft’s acquisition of Activision Blizzard could benefit players.

entries.title: Low-code is becoming more crucial than ever
entries.description: Low-code got many businesses through the pandemic: Mendix reckons its on the trajectory for huge growth.

entries.title: Rackspace warns of phishing risks following ransomware attack
entries.description: Scammers could be exploiting Rackspace users’ vulnerability following recent ransomware attack.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra specs revealed almost in full in an official listing
entries.description: A Chinese certification agency has certified the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra, and listed a lot of specs in the process.

entries.title: Intel Arc GPUs just got faster – and next-gen graphics cards are on track
entries.description: Recent drivers have been ushering in solid gains, but this latest release is a big leap.

entries.title: Feast your ears: Focal’s flagship speakers are now inspired by oysters and chocolate
entries.description: We've been good all year – now all we want for Christmas is a set of Focal’s new oyster-finish Sopra 2 speakers.

entries.title: Forspoken release date, trailers, news and rumors
entries.description: Here's everything we know so far about PS5 exclusive Forspoken.

entries.title: New AMD Radeon RX 7000 GPUs could beat Nvidia RTX 4090 sales
entries.description: AMD RDNA 3 graphics card stock could be plentiful – and might outgun Nvidia’s Lovelace efforts.

entries.title: Fortnite is purposely 'highly addictive', claims class-action lawsuit
entries.description: A class-action lawsuit in Canada claims Fortnite is deliberately 'highly addictive.'

entries.title: Microsoft has bought a 4% share in the London Stock Exchange
entries.description: Partnership with the London Stock Exchange group will bring various Microsoft products, and new market analysis tools, to finance customers.

entries.title: Ant-Man 3 might hold the key to a big Kang reveal in the MCU
entries.description: We might see other fan-favorite Kang variants appear in the MCU after Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania.
